text.p: Swiss President Jean Pascal Delamuraz arrived in Cambodia to a royal welcome at the start of a state visit on Saturday.
Cambodia's King Norodom Sihanouk, making his first public appearance in months, and co-premiers Prince Norodom Ranariddh and Hun Sen greeted Delamuraz and his wife at the airport.
The Swiss president's schedule on Saturday included the opening of the Kantha Bopha II hospital.

He was also scheduled to meet the two co-premiers and sign an investment promotion and protection accord that will safeguard Swiss companies against possible future nationalisation of industry and allow free transfer of profits, officials said.
Delamuraz and his wife will travel on Sunday to Siem Reap to visit the nearby 12th Century Angkor Wat and other temples, according to his official schedule. He leaves Siem Reap for Bangkok on Monday.
